full_text: Finally watched #Aquaman. Enjoyed it. Second best DCEU movie, behind Wonder Woman. A lot of little problems that kept it from getting to next level but a fun movie with Jason Mamoa and Amber Heard carrying the story.

full_text: #Aquaman is excellent. Visually stunning. Surprisingly true to its source material. Jason Momoa was good. Amber Heard was great. The epic story is deftly navigated. As DC films go, this one joins Wonder Woman as the best stuff since Nolan’s Batman trilogy. 👍👍
user.description: Living life under maximum dynamic pressure.

full_text:
Think Aquaman is my new favorite DCU movie.

Wan is a great action director. 

There’s a self-awareness & embracing of the inherent stupid of comics w/o blatantly saying it. 

Supporting cast’s used better than Wonder Woman. 

Comic outfits are authentic af.

Lots of Amber Heard.

full_text: So #aquaman is a 7/10 and DC are on the right track.. the films a little long and uneven. The best stuff is with Nicole Kidman and with amber heard. The films overlong by about 20 mins imo but is the second best DC film after Wonder Woman.

full_text: Just got back from the amazon prime screening of Aquaman and it was a fun film to watch. It coulda been cut down to just 2 hours but that's my opinion and to me it's the 2nd best DCEU film behind Wonder Woman. Also Amber Heard is hot as fuck in the movie. https://t.co/61CZSZOzk8

full_text:
I laughed. I cried. It made me anxious. And guess what, the story was actually fucking great and not a mess like JL was. Jason Momoa is the Aquaman I deserve. Amber Heard is the Mera I never knew I needed.

DCEU be making an amazing come back with Wonder Woman and now Aquaman. https://t.co/cfWjrKTOQC
